name: Dark Pixel Path
description:
Dark Pixel Path

Only brave souls dare venture down the dark path.

Full of traps and shrouded in darkness, how far can you make it down the path?

--Controls--

W/Up Arrow : Move Up

S/Down Arrow: Move Down

A/Left Arrow: Move Left

D/Right Arrow: Move Right

R: Reset

-----

All code and game assets created myself except for free fonts and the walking sound effect.

I would like to add more traps in the future. If you have any ideas, feel free to tell me!
